steps: Find a comfortable seat and soften your gaze.
Rest your hands where they feel natural.
Allow the breath to move the body without effort.
Scan from head to toes, releasing tension.
Return attention to the breath if the mind wanders.
narration: This is a premium session for deep relaxation.
There is nothing you need to do or achieve here.
Find a comfortable position and allow the body to settle.
Begin to breathe slowly and evenly.
Inhale through the nose, steady and full.
Exhale gently, letting the body soften.
Notice the natural rhythm of your breathing.
Allow each exhale to be slightly longer than the inhale.
Soften the jaw and relax the tongue.
Let the shoulders drop away from the ears.
Bring attention to the crown of the head.
Slowly move awareness down through the face and neck.
Notice the chest rising and falling with each breath.
Feel the weight of the body supported beneath you.
If the mind wanders, gently return to the breath.
Rest here for a few more breaths.
When you feel ready, gently reawaken the body.
Carry this calm with you as you return to your day.
narrationLoop: Notice the breath moving on its own.
Rest in the quiet between breaths.
narrationLoopTwo: Feel the breath widen the ribs.
Soften the space behind the eyes.
Return to a calm, steady rhythm.
